channel.title: Making AutoSave on TestScape
channel.description: As it says I need help making a testscape source auto-save every account on the server every so often. Thank you if you post something helpful, if not Flamer!/Spammer!

item.title: Making AutoSave on TestScape
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

[code]
appendPos();

smitimer -= 1;
if(smitimer <= 1) {
savechar();
println_debug(“Auto saved game.”);
savemoreinfo();
println_debug(“Auto saving moreinfo file…”);
if(savemoreinfo()) {
println_debug(“Successfuly auto saved moreinfo file.”);
attempts = 0;
smitimer = 600;
}
else if(!savemoreinfo() && attempts <= 5) {
println_debug(“Error saving moreinfo file! Retrying in 5 seconds”);
println_debug("Attempts: "+attempts);
attempts++;
smitimer = 5;
}
else if(!savemoreinfo() && attempts > 5) {
println_debug(“Attempts: “+attempts+” - Giving up saving moreinfo file!”);
attempts++;
smitimer = 600;
}
}[/code]

ABOVE

if(PrayerTimer >= 0) PrayerTimer--;

Read full topic
